description:
Mizuki has been looking awfully tired of late, so much so that she even falls asleep while doing her stretches. She`s been busy because a friend had asked her to train a group of beginner dancers with an average age in the seventies. While juggling that, her usual job, and practice with Tri-cool, she also gets inundated with requests for advice from her friend, wiping her out completely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Demon Princess and Tribe Chrome Dome
鬼姫とトライブツルツル
